titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the House on November 10, 1987, until November 16, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/10/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from November 10, 1987, until November 16, 1987.
